name: Cyklodev WP Settings
author: Zephilou

sections.description:
Cyklodev WP Settings plugin allow you to modify WordPress core functionnalities who aren’t in the standard backoffice.
At this time there is 4 Enable/Disable settings included : rss feed, login with email, update notification, auto update, gutemberg
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload com.cyklodev.wordpress.setting folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Select your settings in ‘Cyklodev Settings; menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is this a roxy plugin ?

It might be !
sections.changelog:

1.1.1

  • Add data validation to avoid unwanted entries in db

1.1.0

  • Add automatic update enabler/disabler

1.0.0

  • First version with rss/update notification/login with email
